Biographical Sketch

  • 2012-present: University Lecturer, School of Public Health, Imperial College London
  • 2010-2012: Leadership Fellow, Department of Statistics, University of Oxford
  • 2007-2010: Research Fellow, Department of Statistics, University of Warwick
  • 2004-2007 DPhil in Statistical Genetics, Department of Statistics, University of Oxford
  • 2003-2004: Postgraduate studies, Life Science Interface Doctoral Training Centre, University of Oxford
  • 2002-2003: Master of Science, Computing Laboratory, University of Oxford
  • 2000-2002: Degree of Ingénieur, ENSIIE, Evry (France)
  • 1998-2000: Classes préparatoires Scientifiques, Lycée Wallon, Valenciennes (France)
